attributes.action: Private Firms bidding for NHS Contracts should be fully tax compliant
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls upon the government to introduce new regulations, so that only companies fully compliant with UK tax laws can bid for NHS Contracts. Private Health Companies who based themselves overseas, for tax purposes, should be barred from bidding for NHS contracts. Specifically, any profit private firms make from the NHS should be taxable in the United Kingdom.
